name: Get Down Mr President!
description:
WASD to move, Spacebar to dive

As a bodyguard you've got to put your body on the line day in and day out and being one isn't a easy job. Being a VIP's personal body guard makes the job even harder. You're bound to get shot a few times during your line of duty... Escort your VIP through danger filled cities as you desperately try to protect him from deadly enemies, sacrificing yourself for his protection! Luckily you seem to be able to take a couple of hits...

Made for Ludum Dare #43 Jam!
